amendment.description: Amendment directs the VA to examine its practices in how it accounts for returned Post-9/11 GI Benefit payments from either a veteran or an institute of higher learning, and for the purpose of directing the VA to issue a report to Congress no later than January 1, 2011, on any changes made or planned to be made to increase efficiency and timeliness of accounting for returned payments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-570 to decrease the Veteran's Administration General Operating Expense account by $100,000, then increase it by $100,000, for the purpose of directing the VA to examine its practices in how it accounts for returned Post-9/11 GI Benefit payments from either a veteran or an institute of higher learning, and for the purpose of directing the VA to issue a report to Congress no later than Jan. 1, 2011, on any changes made or planned to be made to increase efficiency and timeliness of accounting for returned payments.
